hollywood.name: Angus Cloud's mother dispels suicide rumors: ‘He did not intend to check out’
hollywood.details: Angus Cloud, the talented actor renowned for his role as Fezco in HBO's Euphoria, tragically passed away at the tender age of 25. The young actor was found deceased at his family's residence in Oakland, California.

hollywood.name: Jeremy Allen White clicked kissing a woman in LA amid divorce with Addison Timlin
hollywood.details: Jeremy Allen White has been having a roller coaster of a year. From his wife filing for divorce earlier this year to dating rumors with Selena Gomez, and his show The Bear hitting the top of everyone's watchlist.

hollywood.name: Did Taylor Swift find new fan in UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak? TikToker reveals 'apparently he’s a Swiftie'.
hollywood.details: Taylor Swift is hands down one of the biggest artists of the year so far, with her Era's tour being the talk of the town and Speak Now: Taylor's Version taking over the music charts. The list of celebrities that are attending the singer's concert is only getting longer.

hollywood.name: Barbie 2: Greta Gerwig might have  become USD 1 billion movie
hollywood.details: The genius behind Barbie, director Greta Gerwig has been questioned time and again about doing a second movie for the title. However, she has deftly shelved the idea every time. By giving the excuse of focusing on what's at hand.

hollywood.name: Wonder Woman 3: Gal Gadot starrer might cause irreparable damage to DC's extended universe timeline
hollywood.details: With Gal Gadot confirming that Wonder Woman 3 was under development, a strong debate has appeared as part of DC’s upcoming projects. If a sit down with Comicbook.com, Gal Gadot confirmed that she would be starring in DC’s Wonder Woman.

hollywood.name: Khloe Kardashian ‘Devastated’ After Tristan Thompson, Kim Kardashian Miami Night Out
hollywood.details: On the season finale of The Kardashians, Khloé Kardashian revealed that she let baby daddy Tristan Thompson move back in with her in January. But he may be packing his bags soon!

hollywood.name: Hollywood Strike: Writers To Resume Talks With Studios
hollywood.details: The Writers Guild of America walkout over pay and the threat of artificial intelligence, has brought US film and television production to a halt

hollywood.name: Warner Bros. Apologises After 'Barbenheimer' Tweets Spark Criticism In Japan: Report
hollywood.details: The Warner Bros. Film Group in the United States has issued a public apology about social media activity concerning the 'Barbenheimer' meme, which has caused outrage in Japan, Variety reported.

hollywood.name: Sinead O'Connor Forever: Looking Back At Her Musical Legacy
hollywood.details: Sinead O'Connor was widely known for her provocations but it was her emotive, poignant vocals that propelled her to global acclaim. With a delivery both fierce and breathy, O'Connor sold millions of records following the 1990 album I Do Not Want What I Haven't Got.

hollywood.name: India Box Office Report: Keeping Up With Oppenheimer Vs Barbie
hollywood.details: The world was watching as Greta Gerwig's Barbie and Christopher Nolan's Oppenheimer clashed at the box office last week. While one is a bubblegum drama with a feminist spin, the other documents one of the darkest periods of human history through the eyes of one of its key players..

hollywood.name: Seth Rogen Makes A Shocking Claim, Says Film Studios & Streaming Giants Hate Each Other: “To Think That Universal Has The Same Priorities As Netflix Is Insane
hollywood.details: Seth Rogen believes there’s still “a great distance to go” to resolve the Hollywood writers’ strike. The 41-year-old actor has claimed that film studios and streaming giants are unable to resolve their issues because they “hate each other”.Seth – who is an actor, writer and executive producer – told Sky News: “The studios haven’t even spoken to each other, is what I’ve heard...

bollywood.name: Annu Kapoor says everyone has their struggles, even Mukesh Ambani: ‘Wo bhi struggler hai’
bollywood.details: Annu Kapoor is awaiting the release of his next film Non-Stop Dhamaal. In a recent interview with Times Now Digital, when Annu was asked about the term 'struggling artist.

bollywood.name: Ananya Panday, Aditya Roy Kapur, Sara Ali Khan, Ranbir Kapoor, Kiara Advani and more: Showstoppers at India Couture Week
bollywood.details: Kiara Advani turned showstopper for the opening show by designer duo Falguni and Shane Peacock, and walked the ramp in a pink Barbie-inspired look with bead and sequin work.

bollywood.name: International Friendship Day: Shah Rukh Khan and Kajol to Sara Ali Khan and Janhvi Kapoor, real life celebrity BFFs
bollywood.details: Friendship Day is observed annually on the first Sunday of August. This year, it will be celebrated today, August 6. The theme for International Friendship Day 2023 is Sharing the human spirit through friendship.

bollywood.name: Samantha Ruth Prabhu spends time in the lap of nature, shares breathtaking pictures from vacation
bollywood.details: Samantha Ruth Prabhu is currently on a vacation in Bali. She has now shared pictures from a new location in Bali where she is seen chilling in a pool at a resort made in the heart of nature.

bollywood.name: Katrina Kaif drops romantic pictures with Vicky Kaushal from their sea-facing balcony as they make the most of Sunday
bollywood.details: Katrina Kaif seems to have had a relaxing Sunday with husband Vicky Kaushal. She took to her Instagram Stories Sunday evening to share a few glimpses from their time in the balcony of their sea-facing apartment.

bollywood.name: Made In Heaven Mumbai event: Sobhita Dhulipala, Arjun Mathur launch poster with a dance party
bollywood.details: Prime Video on Wednesday announced that the much-awaited second season of Made In Heaven will premiere on August 10. The announcement was made with big pomp and show at Mumbai seaside.

bollywood.name: Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt and Karan Johar light up Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani success meet in Mumbai
bollywood.details: The cast of Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani at the success meet on Thursday. (From left) Karan Johar, Kshitee Jog, Anjali Anand, Dharmendra, Alia Bhatt, Ranveer Singh, Tota Roy Choudhury, Churni Ganguly.

bollywood.name: New Mom Gabriella Demetriades On Postpartum: 'Joy Outweighs Lack Of Sleep And Social Life
bollywood.details: Model Gabriella Demetriades welcomed her second child, a baby boy, with boyfriend Arjun Rampal last month. The new mama, in an ‘Ask me anything' session on Instagram Stories, spoke about postpartum. A user asked Gabriella, “How much time does it take to feel like yourself postpartum?”

bollywood.name: Commonwealth Youth Games 2023: Madhavan And Wife Sarita Cheer For Son Vedaant
bollywood.details: It's a proud moment for actor R. Madhavan. His son Vedaant Madhavan is competing in the Commonwealth Youth Games 2023 at Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago. Well, this is not it.

bollywood.name: Riteish Deshmukh's Birthday Greeting For Biggest Cheerleader Genelia D'Souza Is Everything
bollywood.details: Riteish Deshmuk's birthday wish for wife Genelia D'Souza, 36 today, is just too cute. He shared a mushy greyscale picture of himself with the birthday girl on his Instagram profile and he wrote, 'To my best friend, my harshest critic

bollywood.name: No Kidding, That's Dharmendra With Little Esha Deol In Epic '80s Throwback
bollywood.details: Esha Deol is a daddy's daughter and her latest Instagram post can vouch for that. The Dhoom actor treated her social media followers to a major 'Thursday throwback' post

fitness.name: What is mental fitness? A how-to for exercising your brain
fitness.details: As with physical fitness, mental fitness has far-reaching benefits. But what does it mean to exercise your mind? Can the brain do crunches?

fitness.name: Serena Williams shares her workout to stay fit during pregnancy, tips to keep in mind
fitness.details: I wanted to show you all how I am staying fit while being pregnant at the same time. A very difficult thing to do but I learned that when you're pregnant you burn so many calories. As much as a triathlon athlete. So I'm trying to take advantage of that and continue to burn those calories.

fitness.name: Kiran Bedi reveals fitness mantra at 74: ‘I have never had samosa, poori, kachori, pakode…
fitness.details: Sharing some advice for those in their 30s and 40s, Dr Bedi said that it is necessary to first accept whatever situation you are in life and then take the decision to either reject it or change it.

fitness.name: Vidya Malavade does acro yoga; know more about the practice
fitness.details: Asanas on the mat is easy because the mat is stable - but here you’re in the air and supported only by arms or legs and that’s a whole new sensation to get used to, said Pragya Bhatt, a yoga expert.

fitness.name: Study finds isometric exercises like planks twice as effective in lowering blood pressure; expert weighs in
fitness.details: The report recommended performing 4x2 minutes of wall sits, with two-minutes’ rest in between, three times a week, alongside other forms of exercise.

fitness.details: Many viral videos of elderly people doing exceptional acts only go on to prove that age is just a number. There is no limit to trying new things in life no matter one's age. Proving the same, a 68-year-old woman has inspired the internet after a video of her working out in the gym went viral

fitness.name: Zomato's Deepinder Goyal Loses 15 Kg, Shares His Fitness Journey In New Post
fitness.details: Zomato's founder and CEO, Deepinder Goyal recently shared a glance into his own personal fitness journey. Mr Goyal, in an Instagram post shared before and after pictures from 2019 and 2023. He also shared two Post-it notes, one from 2019 and the other from 2023.

fitness.details: individuals use hair extensions as a way of covering for hair loss or trying to flaunt a new style. But, what if the attempt to make your tresses look voluminous and trendy backfires? It sounds shocking, but a woman in the United Kingdom is living this nightmare. Shauna Higgins, 24, decided to try extensions after she experienced medical-induced hair loss.

technology.name: Chandrayaan enters moon orbit: 'Feeling lunar gravity'
technology.details: TWENTY-THREE days after it left earth, Chandrayaan-3, aiming to become the first Indian spacecraft to make a soft landing on the moon, entered the lunar orbit on Saturday evening, completing another milestone in its journey.

technology.details: Forget water balloons, Xiaomi has a better way to cool off this summer. The Mijia Pulse Water Gun is a sleek toy that can absorb water and blast it with some LED action.

technology.name: ChatGPT gets new updates: Here’s how they enhance user experience
technology.details: AI powerhouse, OpenAI has released some new features for its sensational chatbot, ChatGPT. The new features allow the chatbot to show suggested follow-up prompts at the bottom of its responses.

technology.name: Judge allows key US antitrust Google search claims to go to trial.
technology.details: A U.S. judge hearing the Justice Department’s antitrust lawsuit accusing Google of unlawfully maintaining monopolies in the internet search market let stand key claims made by the federal government.

technology.details: Altman’s tweets outline both apprehension about the role of AI in shaping future elections and a proactive approach to mitigating risks.

technology.name: NASA selects San Antonio firm
technology.details: NASA’s goal is to land an astronaut on Mars by the late 2030s. But before then, it needs to build a lunar base as a midway point. And to build a lunar base, it needs a landing pad.

technology.name: Threads to get proper search functionality
technology.details: Mark Zuckerberg has revealed that Twitter rival Threads will soon receive a major update that will introduce a search function accessible via the web. He said the update will arrive “in the next few weeks.”

technology.name: Amazon soars on ‘game-changing’ quarter
technology.details: Amazon.com closed up more than 8% on Friday on signs that its growth engines, e-commerce and cloud-computing, were faring well in an uncertain economy, helping shield the broader market from Apple’s 4.8% slide after gloomy iPhone sales.

technology.details: Netflix password sharing: People who are living in your home can use your Netflix account for free, but you can't share it with someone who doesn't live with you. Here are all the details.

food.name: Wait, What? Tourist Billed Rs 180 In Italy For Requesting Sandwich To Be Cut In Half
food.details: During our journey travelling to different destinations, food indeed forms a priority. We often plan what to eat for breakfast or where to head for lunch depending upon our itinerary for the day. It is important to stick to a budget while travelling lest we end up spending too much.

topposts.name: Nuh Hotel From Where Stones Were Thrown At Religious Procession Demolished
topposts.details: Nuh: A massive demolition drive against 'illegal' constructions in Haryana's Nuh has become the latest flashpoint between two communities in the violence-hit state.

topposts.name: 35-Year-Old US Woman Dies After Drinking 2 Litres Of Water In 20 Minutes
topposts.details: Ashley Summers from Indiana was on a vacation with her family over the Fourth of July weekend when she landed in the hospital, New York Post reported. She felt dehydrated amid the scorching heat when she downed four bottles of water within a short span of time, hoping to alleviate her discomfort.

topposts.name: Racing Prodigy Shreyas Hareesh, 13, Dies After Crash At Chennai Track
topposts.details: Copparam Shreyas Hareesh, a 13-year-old prodigy from Bengaluru, succumbed to injuries that he had suffered following a crash in the third round of the Indian National Motorcycle Racing Championship.

topposts.name: Explained: How India Has Clamped Down On Chinese Products, Investment
topposts.details: New Delhi: The Centre said on Friday it would defer the imposition of a licensing requirement for imports of laptops, tablets, and personal computers by three months - partially reversing the surprise decision it announced a day earlier.

topposts.name: 17-year-old D Gukesh Overtakes GM Viswanathan Anand As India's Top-Ranked Chess Player
topposts.details: The 17-year-old teenage prodigy D. Gukesh ended Grandmaster Viswanathan Anand's 37-year reign as India's top chess player in the live world rankings on Thursday.

latestArticles.name: Urbanisation spurs rise of Inflammatory Bowel Disease in rural Telangana
latestArticles.details: Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) has undergone a significant shift in prevalence in India, as per a recent study published in the Lancet journal. The study discovered that IBD is now as prevalent in rural areas just as it is in urban areas, contrasting with the situation two decades ago when it was more widespread in the west.

latestArticles.name: A play around a Salman Khan fandom
latestArticles.details: Salman Khanana Difficultiesu, a Kannada play by Vykhari Theatre, revolves around the life of a fangirl, her family, friends, and neighbours. The play tells the story of Rekha Rani, a teenager who is a big fan of Bollywood actor Salman Khan.

latestArticles.name: Meet the poets who will be at the Bengaluru Poetry Festival
latestArticles.details: Poetry goes on when nothing else does. It is our only weapon against mortality,” says Shinie Antony, festival director of the Bengaluru Poetry Festival, the seventh edition of which will be held on August 5 and 6 at the Grand Mercure Bengaluru, Gopalan Mall.

latestArticles.name: 7 Foods you should never refrigerate
latestArticles.details: Undeniably refrigeration is the most easy and effortless way to retain the shelf life of perishable foods like fruits, veggies and condiments, but do you know that refrigerating certain foods can do more harm than good by ruining the taste, flavour and texture of some foods.

latestArticles.name: Stray dog attack leaves 2-month-old infant with severe facial injuries
latestArticles.details: In a harrowing incident in Karimnagar district, a 2-month-old child was viciously attacked by a stray dog, resulting in serious injuries.The incident occurred in the wee hours of Friday after which the child was taken to a private hospital.

latestStories.name: Ileana D'Cruz Welcomes A Baby Boy, Shares His First Picture: 'Hearts Beyond Full;
latestStories.details: New Delhi: Actress Ileana D'Cruz announced the birth of her first child, a baby boy on Saturday evening on Instagram. Sharing an adorable picture of her little one, the Barfi star also revealed her baby's name.

latestStories.name: ISRO transfers satellite bus technology to Bengaluru-based private firm
latestStories.details: ISRO has transferred the IMS-1 satellite bus technology to Bengaluru-based Alpha Design Technologies, bringing in a new era of increased private industry participation in India's space sector.

latestStories.name: Short bursts of daily activity linked to reduced cancer risk
latestStories.details: Promising new research suggests a total of just 4.5 minutes of vigorous activity that makes you huff and puff during daily tasks could reduce the risk of some cancers by up to 32 percent.

latestStories.name: Zendaya's Tribute To Euphoria Co-Star Angus Cloud. It's OK To Cry
latestStories.details: Angus Cloud, best-known for starring in the drama series Euphoria, died on Monday. He was 25. Angus Cloud famously played the role of drug dealer Fezco O'Neill in the TV series.
